title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 80.5 - Location
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 80.5 - Location

State Regulations

Records shall be available for public inspection and copying
at a convenient location within the Department of Civil Service on the State

Campus, Albany, New York or at the location where they are
kept. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
80.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
